articles.title: Male runner dies after collapsing during London Marathon - The Telegraph
articles.description: Unnamed 36-year-old died in hospital after collapsing in 23rd mile of London Marathon
articles.content:
A man who collapsed around three miles from the finish of Sunday's London Marathon has died, event organisers have confirmed.
The 36-year-old runner, who was from south-east England, collapsed betwe… [+1893 chars]
